# LeafProperty.ProcessorInfoAndFeatures.Features.POPCNT property

Gets a value representing the key to retrieve the property value.

POPCNT instruction. A value of true indicates that the processor supports POPCNT instruction.

Key Composition

* Leaf: ProcessorInfoAndFeatures
* Property: POPCNT
* Unit: None

Return Value

Type: Boolean

```csharp
public static IPropertyKey POPCNT { get; }
```
